67332.name: 8.a.1 - Total official flows commitments for Aid for Trade, by donor - DC_TOF_TRDCMDL
67332.datasetName: Aid for Trade commitments and disbursements
67332.s_name: Aid for Trade commitments and disbursements

source.name: Aid for Trade commitments and disbursements
source.additionalInfo:
Definition: 
 
Aid for Trade commitments and disbursements is the gross disbursements and commitments of total 
Official Development Assistance (ODA) from all donors for aid for trade. 
 
Comments and limitations: 
 
Data in the Creditor Reporting System are available from 1973. However, the data coverage is considered 
complete from 1995 for commitments at an activity level and 2002 for disbursements. 
 

Data Availability 

 
On a donor basis for all DAC countries and many non-DAC providers (bilateral and multilateral) that 
report to the DAC on aid for scholarships. 
 
On a recipient basis for all developing countries eligible for ODA.
